The University of GÃ¶teborg (in Sweden) is advertising a one-year position in the Logic and Types research group at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering:

Competitive candidates are expected to have a strong background, with an excellent publication record, good knowledge about homotopy type theory, and be fluent with actual formalisation in (cubical) Agda. Furthermore, the candidate should know about synthetic algebraic geometry.
